reviewDetails.comment: Excellent
Excellent. Attentive, caring, helpful. Wonderful doctor.
Dr. Pfeffer was very helpful and informative, went above and beyond to make sure I understood the information he shared with me.

Patient of Dr. Prfeffer for over 5 years and would recommend him.  I was treated with utmost respect and care.  Has helped managed my condition and I am now off my maintenance meds.  I just take meds when I have symptoms which is rarely now.
I have seen him for a number of years. He is thoughtful, careful wand knowledgeable. I would highly recommend him.
Dr. Pfeffer has a very attentive and caring manner, and is thorough in his treatment efforts.
Dr. Pfeffer is professional, kind, and clearly explains things = a great doctor.

He is rigorous, transparent, knowledgeable, kind, friendly. He inspires confidence, puts you at ease, and is always informed about you and medical history. He is a good listener and makes recommendations/adjustments regarding procedures/conditions based on new information. His follow up has been excellent over the past several years as well. I have recommended him many times over the past decade.
Very professional and easy to speak with.  He keeps you informed and makes sure you understand what he is doing.  Highly recommend him .

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Rosenberg is a fantastic doctor who cares about their patients and also is easy to access: when I have questions about my medications and medical problems, I sent him a message, he would answer right away. Besides, he is very knowledgeable in the GI medical field, and when I met him, I felt that I was in a good hand. I highly recommend Dr Rosenberg if you have any GI problems.
Highly recommended! Good in explaining the procedure. Great bedside manners. Good staff working with him.
Great doctor. Always caring with a nice bedside manner. Never rushed.
Dr. Rosenberg is a great listener! It’s rare to find a Doctor that listens to a patient’s concerns. He was prepared to be a part of my NYU Langone Medical Team.
Yes most definitely, listens calm straight forward and highly knowledgeable and competent in his specialty
Very thorough, thoughtful and professional, super nice, sent me for all relevant tests straightaway. Would recommend.
Dr. Rosenberg was extremely thorough and he took his time and I felt he kept asking until he completely understood my situation. He is helping greatly in my recovery. I am totally satisfied
It was my first visit and he listened carefully try to understand me. He's very nice.
Dr. Rosenberg is incredibly knowledgeable and very generous. Very very thorough, sympathetic, and friendly.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Marcu is a super kind, caring, and helpful doctor. She has a great personality too, which makes visits enjoyable. Most importantly she's created custom allergy treatments for me which has greatly improved my cat/dog, and seasonal allergies. Whatever is ailing me, eyes, nose, lungs, she has a treatment that works. She's very flexible and easily accommodates my commuter schedule, as I visit while at work in the city.
She listens and asks many questions to help diagnose.  She gave me chocolate today.
She was ok. Definitely more helpful the first time I saw her. Not so much the second time.
Love Dr. Marcu. She is observant and intuitive. She is the best doctor for Asthma and Allergy.
She's fully covered by cigna. Her appointments are quick and her office has flexible hours for quick and efficient allergy shots. 10 out of 10 would recommend.

reviewDetails.comment: Best in the business

Dr. Marchbein created the perfect regimen that has completely transformed my skin. I no longer feel uncomfortable leaving the house without makeup. She is also meticulous when it comes to skin cancer screenings and has identified pre-cancerous items that other dermatologists had said were fine.
Dr Marchbein is incredibly knowledgeable and makes you feel really comfortable and informed on the process. She has a close eye on her patients and the overall patient care is excellent
The best bedside manner and would recommend a thousand times!!
Expert in her field and always on schedule.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Applebaum is just delightful.  Very smart and on top of all the latest cutting edge data for treatment.  He is patient, supportive and he never rushes through an appointment.  He will stay until all your questions are answered.  He is a gem.
Dr Applebaum has a great bedside manner and has a very thorough approach to treating my condition.

The doctor is dedicated to making sure all your concerns are addressed.  I really like his ability to make me feel comfortable while discussing my health concerns.  He responds to questions promptly.  He is a great doctor.

schools.name: George Washington Univ Sch Of Med

reviewDetails.comment: Was a positive experience. Would recommend him to others.
Dr. Lemert has been my gastroenterology for many years. This was the third colonoscopy he has performed on me. He is an excellent physician in every way. I don't intend to see anyone else.

He listened well and explained all the next steps for testing, in order. He was invested in ensuring I understood the practicalities and details of how to monitor my condition and proceed with testing only if and when it would be necessary.
Thorough doctor. Definately would recommend!
